Class KalmanFilter

source code

Implementation of standard Kalman filter

Method Details

__init__(self, stateTransitionMatrix, controlMatrix, measurementMatrix, state, stateCovariance, processCovariance, measurementCovariance)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct Kalman filter.

Parameters:
  • stateTransitionMatrix - State transition matrix.
  • controlMatrix - Control input matrix.
  • measurementMatrix - Measurement observation matrix.
  • state - Initial state estimate.
  • stateCovariance - Initial state covariance matrix.
  • processCovariance - Process noise covariance matrix.
  • measurementCovariance - Measurement noise covariance matrix.
Overrides: object.__init__

predict(self, control=None)

source code 

Predict the system state at the next timestep, updating the estimate.

Parameters:
  • control - Mx1 np.ndarray of control inputs, or None if there are no control inputs to the system.

innovation(self, measurement)

source code 

Calculate the filter innovation and covariance for a given measurement.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.
Returns:
Nx1 innovation vector, NxN covariance matrix of the innovation, and MxN cross covariance from states to measurements.

correct(self, measurement)

source code 

Correct the filter state given a new measurement.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.

update(self, measurement, control=None)

source code 

Run filter update given measurement and control inputs.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.
  • control - Mx1 np.ndarray of control inputs, or None if there are no control inputs to the system.

normalisedInnovation(self, measurement)

source code 

Obtain the normalised innovation for a given measurement.

Parameters:
  • measurement - Nx1 np.ndarray of measurement inputs.
